entry.name: 4: End If RH Attack Queued(可跳转到R1,R2动画)
11: End If LS Move Queued(可跳转到移动动画)
16: End If LH Attack Queued(可跳转到L1,L2动画)

22: End If Guard Queued(可跳转到防御动画)
23: End If AI ComboAttack Queued(AI的combo命令可输入)
26: End If Dodge Queued(跳转到闪避动画)
36: Set0xEF_Bool(可跳转到第一段攻击动画)
37: Left/Right Movement Possible(可以左右移动)
38: Flying Character Fall(飞行角色坠落)
39: Disable Character Ragdoll Collision(无敌且无碰撞体积,但不无视对建筑的碰撞体积)
44: Disable Event Object Collision(每个事件对象无效)
50: Disable Character NPCParam HitRadius Push Collision(禁用角色胶囊碰撞)
51: Disable Falling Animation(禁用下落动作)
56: Disable Wall Attack Clang(墙壁无法弹刀)
57: Disable NPC Wall Attack Clang(NPC攻击无法被墙壁弹刀)
60: Throw Angle Cancel(投掷角度取消)
61: Disable Y-Axis Of Movement Target(禁用移动目标的Y轴)
62: Disable Character Up/Down Aiming(Y轴方向固定)
63: Flag AI For Parry Timing(弹反帧)
64: Enable Chameleon Spell State(可进行拟态)
67: Invincible Excluding Throw Damage Taken(投技攻击以外无敌)
68: Invincible Excluding Throw Damage Dealt(投技伤害以外无敌)
69: Throw Death Animation Transition(被投技侧是否死亡,死亡则投技动画变化)
70: Throw Escape Animation Transition(投技逃脱判定)
71: Stop Poise Recovery After Poise Broken(韧性打空后,韧性无法恢复)
74: Ladder Collision Start(空中碰撞启用)
75: Cancel-Grab Loot(可跳转到开始取得道具动画)
78: End If AI Move Queued(AI移动命令可输入)
79: End If AI Step Queued(AI垫步命令可输入)
80: Cancel-Grab Loot Input Check(可输入道具取得)
81: Disable Grabbed Loot Success `Ok` Prompt(禁用“是”按钮)
82: Perfectly Match Ragdoll Pose(布娃娃开启)
83: Disable Chameleon Spell State(拟态强制解除)
86: End If AI Attack Queued(AI的attack命令可输入-含endure)
88: Disable Precision Shooting(无法精密射击)
90: Limit Move Speed To Walk(限制走路速度)
91: Limit Move Speed To Dash(无法冲刺)
92: Warp Anim Root to Master After Death
97: Disable 'Cancel - Magic', and 'Cancel - Item'(无法使用魔法/道具)
98: Align Look Direction To Head Direction(将观察方向与头部方向对齐)
99: During Corpse Carrying(在携带尸体期间)
101: Corpse Carrying Keyframe(携带尸体的关键帧)
102: Super Armor Forced Break(绝对霸体强制空韧性硬直)
106: Late Weapon Key Input Flag(可输入L2)
110: Disable Joystick Rotation Input(禁用遥杆的旋转输入)
114: Enhanced Camera Tracking(相机追踪强化)
124: InvokeLockOnAutoSearch(被投技时位置不会受地形影响)
128: 死亡检测:玩家死亡出现“死”字-若玩家回生之力被封禁则直接死亡
130: 敌人死亡时道具和金币掉落显示

137: 可跳转到忍义手使用动画
141: 可跳转到水中冲刺动画
